title: It’s a Goth Thing: Meet the Martha Stewart for Macabre Homemakers
description: Through his “Gothic Homemaking” YouTube series, Aurelio Voltaire has become a lifestyle guru to people who embrace spookiness in all seasons.
media:credit: Olivia Crumm for The New York Times
media:description: Since 2016, Aurelio Voltaire has filmed 108 episodes (and one trailer) for his YouTube series “Gothic Homemaking,” which he started as a way to document his progress transforming his East Village apartment into an occult oasis.
